question: Why is serial monogamy prevalent in American life?

answers.text: The proliferation of mobile phones and online dating apps enables the quick formation of committed romantic relationships.
Cycles of marriage and divorce often mirror cycles of stability and disruption in fast-paced capitalist economies.
Children are not valued as sources of household labor in American life, as they may be in other cultures.
American jobs are very stable, which allows people to take more risks and make more choices in their personal lives.
